phrases: If only we could be together for ever and ever.
But, in reality...
Excuse me, is Arima from class 1-A here?
Oh, Miyazawa.
Hang on a sec.
I am sorry, he was just here a moment ago,
but I hear he went over to Construction.
Just a sec.
I hear he got called away by Transportation and Management.
You just missed him.
Hang on.
I hear he went to practice for the hundred meter race.
You just missed him.
Okay, I will check.
Nope, he is not here.
Maybe at the relay?
I have no idea where Arima is.
Oh, shoot!
I have to go to Records!
Oh, Miyazawa?
Arima was just here looking for you.
Miyazawa?
Practice for the Athletics Festival had begun.
And because of it...
Even though we had just started going out the other day...
Because we do not have regular classes this week...
We have only just started going out and
we will soon be busy with the Athletics Festival.
I hope we can at least eat lunch together.
I want to eat with you!
Oh, Arima's so cool!
We were supposed to be enjoying a fabulous lunch together right now...
like in a cola commercial.
But then, this had to happen.
Both love and appetite are out the window...
I wish I could see Arima.
No, love means making time for him even when I am busy.
All right then!
I will do my best for him!
No!
Those rows should be 4 by 10! 6 by 3 is for the VIP section!
Wrong!
Totally wrong!
Sold out?!
Can we send the programs to the printers yet?
Arima?
I just saw him a second ago...
Rats, he just left.
Nope, he has not been here.
Nope, he has not come over here.
I think I heard his voice a while ago.
He blew through here really fast.
Oh no!
The curtain!
Senpai!
Another misprint!
Pretend you did not see it!
It is no use!
Not even Jolt is working any more!
I want to go home...
What the hell is up with this busy-ness?
It is beyond any thought of eating lunch with Arima at this point.
If this keeps up, I will die.
Senpai, I handed in the list...
He is gone.
Wonder where he went?
Oh, well.
I wonder if Arima's feeling like this, too.
Good morning, Miyazawa.
You are really amazing.
You are letting your face slip.
I wanted you to know that I like you.
I fell asleep.
I had a memory dream.
That is right, until a short time ago that is how things were.
I was still Miss Goody-Two-Shoes, and I hated Arima.
Arima was always with me.
Yes, always with me.
I want to see him.
I want to be with him.
I did not think about it at all then.
That I would love Arima this much...
Days till the Athletics Festival
There you are!
Miyazawa!
Arima!
Arima!
Oh, there you are!
Arima, we need you for a minute!
Do not bug me about every fucking thing, GOD DAMMIT!
Sorry.
Could I have just a small break?
Sure.
Go right ahead.
No pressure.
I am all burnt out.
Arima's having a pretty tough time, too.
This mess will be over by tomorrow.
Um, you...you been doing okay?
What?
Oh, just great!
And you?
Except for that little outburst back there...
Oh, I am fine, too.
Oh.
OK.
Uhm... yeah.
*Why are we being so self conscious?* - *I feel awkward when I have not seen you in a while!*
Sorry!
I am supposed to say something smooth at a time like this...
It is ok!
I cannot think of anything either!
Yeah, it was not any fun for me, either.
The Athletics Festival sucks.
I do not want to have anything to do with the School Festival or the field trip anymore.
We have not been able to do anything that couples do at all.
Nice weather.
What?
I have to get back.
See ya.
More than anything else... that freaked me out.
I hope we can always be together.
Alrighty then!
Let us do it!
The actual Athletics Festival was really great.
Arima looked really cool when he got serious.
And we finally got to eat lunch together.
Around this time of year the groups that people hang out with get generally settled by class and club activities.
This is also the time when the instant couples...
New couples began popping up all over the place.
But this is a pair of guys...
Both of them are good-looking, so they stand out.
Hey hey, what is that guy's name?
Oh, Asaba?
What?!
Miyazawa, do not you know who Asaba is?
He is Asaba Hideaki from class 1-F.
He and Arima are 10th grade's two greatest heart throbs!
He is really popular, too!
He carried the trash cans for me.
He fetched a ball for me.
He really likes girls, does not he?
He is so cute!
Firefighters are really cool.
If he and Arima are friends,
I guess I should make friends with him, too.
I am going out with Arima, after all...
Oh, hi...
Oh, you are Arima's girlfriend.
The guys all say you are cute...
Hey, Miyazawa.
What Are You up to?
Arima...
Hm?
Am I c...
You are very cute!
Damn you!
Asaba!
Even though I have withdrawn from active duty...
You are dead meat!
Just you watch, Asaba!
You are about to feel my true wrath!
Ah...
Ah...
You bitch!
Are not you some kind of petite model student or something?!
Humph!
It is your fault for making me mad.
Damn bitch!
Now I am really pissed!
Stuff it!
I will give you those words right back!
We met in the worst way possible...
who fought at first sight of each other.
I wonder what is up with Miyazawa and Asaba.
They are at each other's throats.
But she is usually so sweet, and Asaba's normally really nice to girls...
I hear you are not getting along with Asaba.
*Pout!*
I do not want to hear that name right now.
I might go into combat mode and then there is no telling what I would do.
What are you talking about?
I swear!
Arima, how come you are friends with him?!
What is so good about him?!
Nothing in particular.
When he talks to me, I talk back.
I do not see him as a friend or anything.
I cannot figure him out.
What Are You lookin' at?
Movie listings.
Want To take a look?
Sure!
The movies...
I have not seen any lately.
Anything good playing?
I was thinking this might be good...
Um...say, Miyazawa?
If you are not busy or anything,
do you want to go see it with me this Sunday?
Yes!
Let us go, let us go,
Yay, a first date!
A lot's happened since I came to this school,
but I have finally made it this far!
There went my mood.
Hey, are not WE in a good mood today.
None of your business.
You going on a date with Arima or something?
What if I am?
Arima's got pretty weird tastes.
He could have had his pick of better chicks if he wanted to.
What are you doing?!
Let go!
Well, I bet Arima'll get tired of this thing soon enough.
I guess there is nothing to worry about.
Shut up.
I am taking Arima for myself.
Oh my god...
I heard there is a lot of them lately, but you are really a...
I AM NOT!
I love women!
*My sweet,*
Cute little lambs...
I have always loved having them all around me.
I have come to hold a certain ambition.
I want more and more girls around me!
I am going to create Asaba Mary-Land someday!
And that is where Arima comes in.
He is the partner I have been seeking all these years.
His good looks will contribute greatly to my ambition.
All the little Marys will be charmed by our brilliance...
Hey, Mister High School Pervert!
What the hell're you trying to get Arima mixed up in?!
It does not matter!
I do not care as long as I am happy!
So that is why you are dissing me, because I am the girlfriend.
You finally figured it out.
Since you were a quiet little model student...
Seems I miscalculated.
But I guess I do not hafta go to all the trouble of trying to break you two up.
With a girlfriend like you, Arima'll be the one to run away.
You are really pissing me off!
What a jerk!
I never figured you to be such an ass!
How can you be so indifferent?
Are not you ashamed?
Well, let me ask you something then...
What about yourself?
I do not think you and me are all that different.
You played the model student and deceived everyone else, did not you?
If I am a jerk, then so are you.
Why do not you stop and think about whether you are all that well suited for Arima.
Just try to come up with some kind of retort.
I will even give up on Arima if my argument is wrong.
Touche.
Miyazawa?
It is always been in the back of my mind so I cannot refute it.
What did you say to Miyazawa?
I know you are trying to use me.
Not to be conceited,
but many people have tried to use me in the past.
But I will not permit you to hurt her.
You seem to be pretty soft on her.
Tell me, what is so good about her?
Do not you get it?
She stays because she wants to.
I got here early.
Got To cheer up.
I cannot stop being his girlfriend just because of what his friend said.
Here I am.
Which one are we seeing again?
Can we still make it?
No problem, no problem.
Sorry for making you wait!
He is not there.
I have got the time and place right.
Tomorrow, at one of the clock...
I wonder if something happened.
That was great.
Thanks for the meal.
See you later.
I was really looking forward to this.
Yo.
What are you doing here?
Oh, a date with Arima?
What?
Looks like it is starting already.
You got stood up, did not you.
Shut up!
I cannot believe you are making fun of me at a time like this!
*Hey, he is making that girl cry!*
So I have been stood up!
Who cares!
I chose to wait!
Just leave me alone!
Sorry, I did not think you were actually stood up.
And I am sorry about the stuff I said before.
Is this a trap?
No, believe me...
I was wrong!
That is some change of heart.
Well, things happened...
I guess it means I do not fight fights I cannot win.
Hmmm?
What about the Mary-Land Project?
Oh, that is history, too.
It came to feel kind of empty...
And, I just realized...
I do not actually hate you.
I guess I had fun being with you.
I am sorry!
Just as I was leaving, my mom collapsed from anemia,
and my father was out...
Apologize!
You are a disgrace to all men, making a girl wait!
Never make a girl wait, even if it means abandoning your parents!
Die!
Die as your apology to her!
It is okay!
Do not worry about it anymore!
So she says.
He did that on purpose.
He put on that performance so there would not be any hard feelings left over between us.
Still, that was dangerous.
I thought he was a jerk at first...
Why the heck are you here?
I slept over at Arima's place last night.
You are even going over to his house?
Right before we went to sleep, Arima told me all about what you did that day...
He is so cute!
He is so innocent...
SHUT UP!
Shut up, shut up, shut the hell up!
Anyway, I made a new friend.
What will happen next!
Sis has made a new friend and
has finally obtained happiness.
She and Arima make up for
their failed first date!
And has the time of fate finally arrived?!
Next time on KareKano: Your Voice That Changes Me.
It is so embarassing!
